Name: CSM SEPARATION
checklistText:
<size=21>CSM SEPARATION checklist</size>
V49E	F 06 22 (EXTRACT ATT)
cb SECS LOGIC (2) - closed (verify)
cb SECS ARM (2) - closed (verify)
SECS LOGIC (2) - on (up)(verify)
RCS CMD - ON
SECS PYRO ARM (2) - ARM
GDC ALIGN
EMS FUNC - ΔV (verify)
EMS MODE - NORMAL
59:30	Start DET
59:50	CMC MODE - AUTO
59:58	Thurst +X and hold
00:00	CSM/LV SEP pb - push, hold, and release
	LV TANK PRESS - full scale low
00:03	THC - release (ΔV .5 fps)
	SM RCS PRPLNT tb (8) - gray(verify)
	SM RCS He tb (8) - gray (verify)
	SM RCS SEC PRPLNT FUEL PRESS (4) - CLOSE
	FC REAC vlv - NORM
